titleStmt.title: [Parismus, the renouned prince of Bohemia.]
Parismus, the renouned prince of Bohemia. Parts 1-2
titleStmt.author: Ford, Emanuel.

titleStmt.title: [Parismus, the renouned prince of Bohemia.]
Parismus, the renouned prince of Bohemia. Parts 1-2
titleStmt.author: Ford, Emanuel.

notesStmt.note: Another edition of STC 11171 including both parts--STC.
Running title reads: The second part of Parismus.
"Parismenos: the second part of the most famous, delectable, and pleasant historie of Parismus, the renowned Prince of Bohemia." has separate title page on leaf A2, dated 1605, and separate register.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
Part 2 only; missing B4, K4-O4, and all after 2A4.
